title: Reasoning Under Pressure: How do Training Incentives Influence Chain-of-Thought Monitorability?
summary: AI systems that output their reasoning in natural language offer an opportunity for safety -- we can \emph{monitor} their chain of thought (CoT) for undesirable reasoning, such as the pursuit of harmful objectives.
